overview: Scripted collaboratively with King and Brintzenhofe, the filmmakers created a cinedance that takes the viewer through the thresholds of dreaming, waking, and transcendental awareness, using real and painted images of the city, a 19th century attic and outer space.  King’s voice recounts a dream of space without walls, a time of childhood and ecstacy.  © 1981 Robyn Brentano, Andrew Horn, Kenneth King
title: Space City
